title: According to Pat McGrath, These Are the Most Important Luxury Beauty Gifts to Buy
description: It wouldn't be a Pat McGrath holiday without a shimmering eyeshadow palette.
excerpt: It wouldn't be a Pat McGrath holiday without a shimmering eyeshadow palette.
text: Each year, when the fashion week circuits roll around, there’s always one name that causes ears and eyes to perk in excitement—Pat McGrath. Where glass skin and minimalism have become commonplace on runways, the makeup whisperer, or “Mother” to beauty’s in-the-know, favors looks that will spawn conversations for weeks to come—remember the Porcelain doll-like skin at Maison Margiela’s 2024 runway? With an eye for innovation, it makes sense that McGrath’s holiday gifting strategy follows the same approach. Mother knows best, and understands that any fan of hers is a fan of luxurious, problem-solving formulas that enhance your makeup looks, transform your skin, and elevate your day-to-day routine. How about a Louis Vuitton crossbody to house your Pat McGrath Labs LiquiLUST lipstick? Perhaps the secret to McGrath’s poreless, filter-like skin is a team of light therapy skin tools. If you’ve hit a wall trying to score the absolute best gift for the beauty novice or obsessive in your life, Pat McGrath’s guide to luxury beauty gifting has a solution for every price point. Ahead, scroll through her expert recommendations. Pat McGrath’s pro-tip: “A personal touch is the ultimate gift of luxury. Whether it’s the perfectly curated shade, a beautifully packaged self-care treat, or an unforgettable statement piece, think about what makes the recipient feel special—something that elevates their every day and brings a smile to their face.”For the Beauty Novice PAT McGRATH Labs Skin Fetish: Sublime Perfection Foundation “Gorgeous, radiant skin is fundamental to every look I create,” McGrath explains. “And this formula is buildable, hydrating, and light as air. You can apply it to your skin with your hands, like a moisturizer, or buff it out with a brush. No matter how much you apply, it will look like skin.”PAT McGRATH Labs Dramatique Mega Lip Pencil Obsessed“My newest artistry tool is so versatile and easy to use, and allows endless creativity for anyone you gift to,” says McGrath. “Whether they are looking for a precise lined lip or a saturated, full, bold lip, my Dramatique Mega Lip Pencil does it all. Plus, it comes in 12 vivid and vibrant shades to cater to all skin tones”Lilysilk Pure Mulberry Silk CaseNow 10% Off“Beauty sleep is essential for everyone on your list,” McGrath advises. “This silk pillowcase reduces friction, keeping skin smooth and hair tangle-free. An easy, luxurious upgrade for any nighttime ritual.”Janeke Large Pneumatic Mixed Bristle Hairbrush“Even if you’re not an expert hairstylist, this heirloom-quality brush transforms daily routines into moments of indulgence, leaving hair shiny, smooth, and beautifully styled,” says McGrath.For the Beauty ExpertPAT McGRATH Labs Luminous Legends: Mega Eye Shadow Palette“My most ambitious holiday palette yet, I created this for those who see color as art,” says McGrath. “With 15 ultra-wearable shades in matte, shimmer, metallic, and astral textures, it’s the ultimate gift for creating any holiday look you desire.”Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare SpectraLite™ FaceWare Pro“For someone like me who loves to experiment with technology in beauty, this one is truly a skin superhero,” says McGrath. “I look forward to glowing for three minutes every night before bed.”PAT McGRATH Labs IntensifEYES™ Artistry Wand“A pro’s ultimate tool—this versatile wand amplifies pigments, giving shadows an electrifying boost for creating eye looks that captivate,” McGrath shares.For a Luxury SplurgeJennifer Behr Fiorella Headband“With New Year’s Eve coming up, Jennifer Behr headbands are the perfect gifts to elevate someone’s look” says McGrath. “I love to create a look by layering different headbands of different textures and finishes.”Louis Vuitton Coussin MM“This was actually a really nice gift that I received from my dear friend Nicolas Ghesquiere, so I can attest that it’s a great bag,” McGrath says. “This is my go-to bag for a night out—it fits my phone, a portable charger, and all my PAT McGRATH Labs essentials.”Naked Cashmere Travel Set “Weightless warmth and cozy comfort, this is a perfect set for anyone who loves indulging in the finer things—at home or in-flight,” McGrath recommends.Lyma Laser Starter Kit in Beauty“For anyone looking for a powerful, high-quality laser treatment they can do at home on their couch, this is the ultimate gift worth every penny,” suggests McGrath.Beauty Gifts Under $50Byredo Burning Rose Candle“Aside from a bath, nothing’s more soothing than candles,” McGath admits. “I absolutely adore Byredo’s Burning Rose scent. Leather and dark woods with a hint of my beloved roses? It’s so decadent.”Bioderma Sensibio H2O“Wipe on, wipe off. This iconic cleansing liquid removes makeup, pollutants, and debris while pampering even the most sensitive skin,” McGrath explains. “I wish they sold it by the gallon for my team backstage”PAT McGRATH Labs LiquiLUST™: Legendary Wear Lipstick“This rule-breaking, comfort-matte lipstick drenches lips in an ultra-velvety veil of intensely saturated color and comes in one of the most popular shades on the planet—Elson 4 [Taylor Swift’s favorite shade,” McGrath reveals.Stocking Stuffers Jennifer Fisher Lilly Hoops, 2-Inch in Gold “I’m passionate about my gold [jewelry,” reveals McGrath. “I love how these give so much richness and sleekness to any look.”PAT McGRATH LABS Mini MatteTrance™“Three iconic shades, perfectly sized for glamour on the go,” says McGrath.Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Balm“A pocket-sized tube of hydrating bliss, this is an instant luxury in your handbag,” McGrath says.
html:
Each year, when the fashion week circuits roll around, there’s always one name that causes ears and eyes to perk in excitement—Pat McGrath. Where glass skin and minimalism have become commonplace on runways, the makeup whisperer, or “Mother” to beauty’s in-the-know, favors looks that will spawn conversations for weeks to come—remember the Porcelain doll-like skin at Maison Margiela’s 2024 runway? With an eye for innovation, it makes sense that McGrath’s holiday gifting strategy follows the same approach.

Mother knows best, and understands that any fan of hers is a fan of luxurious, problem-solving formulas that enhance your makeup looks, transform your skin, and elevate your day-to-day routine. How about a Louis Vuitton crossbody to house your Pat McGrath Labs LiquiLUST lipstick? Perhaps the secret to McGrath’s poreless, filter-like skin is a team of light therapy skin tools. If you’ve hit a wall trying to score the absolute best gift for the beauty novice or obsessive in your life, Pat McGrath’s guide to luxury beauty gifting has a solution for every price point. Ahead, scroll through her expert recommendations.

Pat McGrath’s pro-tip: “A personal touch is the ultimate gift of luxury. Whether it’s the perfectly curated shade, a beautifully packaged self-care treat, or an unforgettable statement piece, think about what makes the recipient feel special—something that elevates their every day and brings a smile to their face.”

For the Beauty Novice

PAT McGRATH Labs Skin Fetish: Sublime Perfection Foundation

“Gorgeous, radiant skin is fundamental to every look I create,” McGrath explains. “And this formula is buildable, hydrating, and light as air. You can apply it to your skin with your hands, like a moisturizer, or buff it out with a brush. No matter how much you apply, it will look like skin.”

PAT McGRATH Labs Dramatique Mega Lip Pencil Obsessed

“My newest artistry tool is so versatile and easy to use, and allows endless creativity for anyone you gift to,” says McGrath. “Whether they are looking for a precise lined lip or a saturated, full, bold lip, my Dramatique Mega Lip Pencil does it all. Plus, it comes in 12 vivid and vibrant shades to cater to all skin tones”

Lilysilk Pure Mulberry Silk Case

Now 10% Off

“Beauty sleep is essential for everyone on your list,” McGrath advises. “This silk pillowcase reduces friction, keeping skin smooth and hair tangle-free. An easy, luxurious upgrade for any nighttime ritual.”

Janeke Large Pneumatic Mixed Bristle Hairbrush

“Even if you’re not an expert hairstylist, this heirloom-quality brush transforms daily routines into moments of indulgence, leaving hair shiny, smooth, and beautifully styled,” says McGrath.

For the Beauty Expert

PAT McGRATH Labs Luminous Legends: Mega Eye Shadow Palette

“My most ambitious holiday palette yet, I created this for those who see color as art,” says McGrath. “With 15 ultra-wearable shades in matte, shimmer, metallic, and astral textures, it’s the ultimate gift for creating any holiday look you desire.”

Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare SpectraLite™ FaceWare Pro

“For someone like me who loves to experiment with technology in beauty, this one is truly a skin superhero,” says McGrath. “I look forward to glowing for three minutes every night before bed.”

PAT McGRATH Labs IntensifEYES™ Artistry Wand

“A pro’s ultimate tool—this versatile wand amplifies pigments, giving shadows an electrifying boost for creating eye looks that captivate,” McGrath shares.

For a Luxury Splurge

Jennifer Behr Fiorella Headband

“With New Year’s Eve coming up, Jennifer Behr headbands are the perfect gifts to elevate someone’s look” says McGrath. “I love to create a look by layering different headbands of different textures and finishes.”

Louis Vuitton Coussin MM

“This was actually a really nice gift that I received from my dear friend Nicolas Ghesquiere, so I can attest that it’s a great bag,” McGrath says. “This is my go-to bag for a night out—it fits my phone, a portable charger, and all my PAT McGRATH Labs essentials.”

Naked Cashmere Travel Set

“Weightless warmth and cozy comfort, this is a perfect set for anyone who loves indulging in the finer things—at home or in-flight,” McGrath recommends.

Lyma Laser Starter Kit in Beauty

“For anyone looking for a powerful, high-quality laser treatment they can do at home on their couch, this is the ultimate gift worth every penny,” suggests McGrath.

Beauty Gifts Under $50

Byredo Burning Rose Candle

“Aside from a bath, nothing’s more soothing than candles,” McGath admits. “I absolutely adore Byredo’s Burning Rose scent. Leather and dark woods with a hint of my beloved roses? It’s so decadent.”

Bioderma Sensibio H2O

“Wipe on, wipe off. This iconic cleansing liquid removes makeup, pollutants, and debris while pampering even the most sensitive skin,” McGrath explains. “I wish they sold it by the gallon for my team backstage”

PAT McGRATH Labs LiquiLUST™: Legendary Wear Lipstick

“This rule-breaking, comfort-matte lipstick drenches lips in an ultra-velvety veil of intensely saturated color and comes in one of the most popular shades on the planet—Elson 4 [Taylor Swift’s favorite shade,” McGrath reveals.

Stocking Stuffers

Jennifer Fisher Lilly Hoops, 2-Inch in Gold

“I’m passionate about my gold [jewelry,” reveals McGrath. “I love how these give so much richness and sleekness to any look.”

PAT McGRATH LABS Mini MatteTrance™

“Three iconic shades, perfectly sized for glamour on the go,” says McGrath.

Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Balm

“A pocket-sized tube of hydrating bliss, this is an instant luxury in your handbag,” McGrath says.
